mayeso a abel: Njira yoyesera kuphatikizika kwa mndandanda wopandamalire
kumvana kwathunthu: Mndandanda wopandamalire akuti umalumikizana kwathunthu ngati chiwonjezeko cha ziwerengero zachidule chili ndi malire.
Mtheradi pazipita: Mtengo wapamwamba kwambiri womwe ntchito imapeza
osachepera mtheradi: Mtengo wotsika kwambiri womwe ntchito imapeza
mtheradi: Mtengo wopanda-negative wa nambala yeniyeni mosaganizira chizindikiro chake
alternating mndandanda: Mndandanda wopandamalire womwe mawu ake amasinthasintha pakati pa zabwino ndi zoyipa
alternating series test: Njira yomwe imagwiritsidwa ntchito kutsimikizira kuti mndandanda wosinthika wokhala ndi mawu otsika mtengo ndi mndandanda wosinthika.
annulus: Chinthu chokhala ngati mphete, chigawo chomangidwa ndi mabwalo awiri ozungulira
antiderivative: Ntchito yosiyanitsidwa yomwe chotengera chake ndi chofanana ndi choyambirira
asymptote: Mzere woti mtunda wapakati pa piringidzo ndi mzerewo ufikire ziro ngati chimodzi kapena zonse ziwiri za x kapena y zolumikizira zimakhala zopanda malire.
m'dera la pansi pa kupindika: Chophatikizika chomwe chikuyimira dera lapakati pa mayendedwe y=f(x), x-axis, ndi mizere yowongoka x=a ndi x=b, pomwe a ndi b ndi malire akuphatikiza.
lamulo la unyolo: Chochokera ku ntchito yophatikizika ndichochokera ku ntchito yakunja yomwe imawunikidwa pa nthawi ya ntchito yamkati yomwe imachokera ku ntchito yamkati.
calculus yosiyana: Amawerengera kuchuluka kwa kusintha kwa kuchuluka. The derivative equation imagwiritsidwa ntchito pofotokoza kuchuluka kwa kusintha kwa ntchito
wodziyimira pawokha: Kuchuluka komwe kumasinthidwa mu ntchito kapena equation, nthawi zambiri kuyimira choyambitsa mu ubale woyambitsa ndi zotsatira
kudalira kusintha: Zotsatira kapena zotsatira za ntchito kapena ubale womwe umasintha malinga ndi zikhalidwe zazinthu zina
domain: Zimatanthawuza kuzinthu zonse zomwe zingatheke zomwe zingagwiritsidwe ntchito ngati cholowetsa kuntchito
osiyanasiyana: Seti ya zotulutsa zonse zomwe ntchito ikhoza kupanga
malire: Lingaliro lomwe limafotokoza zomwe ntchitoyo imayendera imayandikira pamene zolowa zikuyandikira mtengo wina
zotumphukira: Lingaliro lomwe limayesa kuchuluka kwa kusintha kwanthawi yomweyo kapena kutsetsereka kwa mzere wa tangent pamalo ena pa ntchito.
calculus yofunika: Kuwonjezeka kwa calculus komwe kumaphatikizapo kupeza antiderivative ya ntchito yomwe chotuluka chake chaperekedwa
mzere wofunikira: Kuphatikizika kwa ntchito motsatira mzere wa curve
pamwamba chofunika: Kuphatikizika kwazinthu zosiyanasiyana zophatikizika kuphatikizira pamwamba
calculus multivariable: Kuwonjezeka kwa calculus mu chosinthika chimodzi kupita ku calculus ndi ntchito zamitundu ingapo
gawo la vector: Malo omwe ali ndi ukulu ndi mayendedwe
mawerengero a vector: Kuwonjezedwa kwa calculus komwe kumakhudzana ndi kusiyanitsa ndi kuphatikiza kwa gawo la vector mu danga la Euclidean la magawo atatu.
kuthekera kwa vector: Gawo la vekitala lomwe limapangitsa kuti pakhale gawo la solenoidal kudzera mwa woyendetsa ma curl
